tool_description: Analyzes potential reviewer biases based on demographics, publication patterns, institutional affiliations, and review history to promote fair evaluation.

reviewer_ids.description: List of reviewer identifiers to analyze

bias_types.description: Types of bias to analyze: gender, geographic, institutional, methodological, theoretical

sensitivity_level.description: Sensitivity level for bias detection: high, medium, low

error_messages: Invalid bias types: Use combinations of [gender, geographic, institutional, methodological, theoretical].
Invalid sensitivity level: Use one of [high, medium, low].
Array length mismatch: author_demographics and institutional_info must match in length if provided.
Invalid reviewer IDs: Some provided reviewer identifiers do not exist.
Too many reviewers: Limit to 50 reviewers for bias analysis efficiency.
usage: Provide reviewer_ids to analyze potential biases. Add author_demographics and institutional_info for more targeted analysis. Configure bias_types and sensitivity_level to adjust detection parameters.

bias_scores.description: Overall bias risk scores (0-1) for each reviewer

bias_categories.description: Primary bias categories detected for each reviewer

risk_levels.description: Risk levels for each reviewer: low, medium, high

bias_summary.description: Summary of bias analysis and diversity recommendations
